channel.title: Peaks To Craters Scenic Byway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Peaks To Craters Scenic Byway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: End ID-75 North at US-93
item.description: End ID-75 at US-93. Turn left for US-93 north to Challis and Salmon. Turn right for US-93 south to Arco. US-93 north is part of the Salmon River Scenic Byway; US-93 south is part of the Peaks to Craters Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-93 South - Peaks To Craters Scenic Byway
item.description: US-93 South - Peaks To Craters Scenic Byway in Custer County.

item.title: End ID-75 North at US-93
item.description: End ID-75 at US-93. Turn left for US-93 north to Challis and Salmon. Turn right for US-93 south to Arco. US-93 north is part of the Salmon River Scenic Byway; US-93 south is part of the Peaks to Craters Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-20/US-93/US-26 West - Peaks to Craters
item.description: Peaks to Craters Scenic Byway on US-20/US-26 West/US-93 South between Arco and Craters of the Moon. Peaks to Craters Scenic Byway is one of the newest Idaho scenic byways, created in 2010. It runs from Challis to just south of Sun Valley.
